Title: Sales Trainer
RoleDescription: Overview:Were looking for a Sales Machine (aka the Sale Training Executive) to help our sales reps level up. This role is all about coaching reps on real-world selling  from refining their talk tracks to mastering discovery calls and closing with confidence. You'll be the go-to person for helping reps break through plateaus, build on their strengths, and consistently hit (or exceed) quota.Youll design and run structured coaching programs, create personalized skill-building paths, and work closely with leadership to turn feedback into results. If you're someone who loves unlocking potential in others and has a passion for high-performance sales, this is your role.Key Responsibilities:- Coach reps in 1-on-1 and group sessions on key sales skills like objection handling, discovery, closing, and negotiation- Create scalable and tailored coaching programs for different skill levels and sales stages including online modules, videos, curriculum- Design personalized learning paths to help each rep grow based on their current strengths and gaps- Track rep progress and ensure key concepts are being applied in real sales conversations- Use sales performance data to adjust coaching programs and prioritize high-impact areas- Partner with sales leadership to identify rep needs and align coaching with team goals- Lead live role plays, feedback loops, and peer learning to reinforce a culture of continuous improvement- Maintain and update sales materials  scripts, playbooks, talk tracks  to support coaching goalsQualifications:- 3+ years of experience in sales coaching, sales enablement, or a high-performing sales role - Experience designing and executing training programs that improved measurable sales performance - Proven track record of helping reps hit quota and level up through coaching - Excellent communication skills  clear, motivational, and constructive- Ability to turn feedback and sales data into actionable coaching strategies - Comfortable using LMS platforms, e-learning tools, and sales tech stacks (CRM, enablement tools, etc.) - Self-starter with a passion for developing people and driving performance
